website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality nursing cover with some nice features that many others don't have.
pros: Made of lightweight 100% cotton with a rigid neckline so you can easily see baby
Includes two internal terry cloth pockets for cleanups and storage
cons: A little pricier than other nursing covers

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the coverage and design. Pros: -non see through material -adequate coverage -Rig flex neckline is amazing Cons: -can get a little toasty underneath -neck tie area gets folded after washing, so you have to iron it out or else it'll be super skinny and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! Not see through! Big, easy to use, love the wire so you dont have to hold the thing to be able to see your baby! The only thing I do have to say is that in warm weather it can be a little warm, if this is your case, I would suggest purchasing the same product but with the Muslin fabric, which I have as well. FYI I did read reviews saying that the muslin ones can be a little transparent, so I bought a blue one and it is not transparent.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: It just comes down to preference to nursing covers and I didn't particularly love this one. I prefer the stretchier ones. Also, if you want to nurse under a cover, I suggest getting your baby used to it early on. I didn't even try using one until my son was 9 months old and he hated being covered up. He's a liberated feminist. However, it's easy to use and lightweight. I found the print (Nest) very drab in person.
customer_reviews.author: thrillhouse

customer_reviews.title: Best cover ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this cover!!! Started out with those multi use covers that can be a poncho or car seat cover and I hated it! It was hot, didn't have any air flow, and was super complicated when I had to use the nipple shield. This gives you the ability to make sure you have a good latch and be able to use both hands if needed! So glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Shelbi Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover, pattern is a little to interesting to baby
customer_reviews.text: The curved neckline is great because it allows you to see your baby while breastfeeding. I've also found it really useful for pumping in a semi-private place, like in the car. It just gives me the privacy that I would like. I really like the pattern, but unfortunately the baby does too, and sometimes he is a little distracted by staring at it. The black and white pattern might not be the best option in that case.
customer_reviews.author: Ayrl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cover! The material is soft and light, it has pockets on the bottom inside area to store your breast pads while feeding, and it's easy to see baby while wearing it. Other covers that I've used in the past have collapsed while trying to see baby, and the material wasn't that great. This cover is by far the best I've used. I'm very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Leann B.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted in a nursing cover! Easy to use. The plastic inside the hem at the top allows me to see baby while using this hands-free. Lightweight so baby doesn't get overheated under it. Folds up very small and uses minimal space in diaper bag. Added burp cloth material on edges is nice in a pinch. Nice coverage overall. Wish it came in more prints, or simple solids!
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Breatheable and functional
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this cover to any others while in public. I still need to see my little one at 3 months to make sure she's positioned well and I just couldn't do that with a blanket or an infinity style wrap. I also run hot and so does my little one which is another reason I prefer this one. I am on the modest side so I want to keep myself covered while feeding where and whenever baby is hungry and this cover definitely helps me achieve that.
customer_reviews.author: Claire S Snelson

customer_reviews.title: I don't get it
customer_reviews.text: This nursing cover was horrible for me - I spent most of them time trying to keep it in place but it was hopeless! If you're concerned about modesty this isn't the product for you. I flashed the public with my boob at every feeding I used this for. I think a swaddle blanket draped over your shoulder is better than this - I don't get all of the positive reviews. Material also isn't particularly soft.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Best Nursing Cover for First-time Moms
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first-time mom, and received several different nursing covers. This is the only one I use because I can easily see my baby and help her latch. Also, I feel like she has more ventilation than other covers where the baby is completely covered, especially in the summer. So glad my friend who has three kids recommended this to me!
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Great but go with Muslin material if in warm climate!
customer_reviews.text: Sort of light weight but tried a friends made of the Muslin material and it was so much cooler in a warm climate!!! So if summer or spring, I'd recommend the Muslin one. This one is nicely made and good quality! I love that you can see baby with D ring opening! That's a major plus!
customer_reviews.author: cyatraveler

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, breathable & cute
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to feel the fabric before purchasing it because I was worried it would be too thick and hot. It's really nice light weight material and not see through. Glad I read reviews and they were right.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Must have for expectant mothers!
customer_reviews.text: I originally did not think this was necessary to have, I received a different one as a gift- an infinity scarf. But soon realized this was a must! I recommend it to everyone I know that’s expecting a baby! Especially in church and out and about it’s so quick to pull out and folds up so nicely in the diaper bag too! I was worried folding it up would ruin the wiring around the top- but it doesn’t! Being able to see her as I’m nursing is so convenient! I am extremely happy I ended up getting this! Definitely an item I couldn’t go without!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this cover!
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this cover a lot. I like the size, the rigid neckline, and the color. My only suggestion is that a strap be added to go around your back. When you're on the beach the cover can blow around, and a previous cover I had did better in the wind because it had the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for pumping!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been using this cover for 7 months. Here's her assessment: The hoop feature that allows visibility to what's happening is a HUGE plus and sets the Bebe Au Lait line apart from other brands. It's the only cover I use after trying out a number of others. I've been exclusive pumping from birth, so I have to regularly check on the position of the pump parts and that's super convenient with this cover. It's very soft cotton and looks stylish. I think I've had a little shrinkage through time in the length, but there is still adequate fabric all the way around. It's been washed frequently on gentle cycle (warm water) with loads of baby laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.Top Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but had a weird smell.
customer_reviews.text: This cover had a horrible chemical smell when I opened the package, but it went away after one wash. I wish the cover was slightly larger, but it seems to be good quality and I love the pattern. I am able to see what I am doing and get my baby latched on. It has made nursing in public so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Riley A.

customer_reviews.title: I like this product a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot, easy to see the baby and the fabric is cotton so not too hot for me or the baby. The coverage is perfect, and I am a larger person (5' 9", 160 lbs) so it's nice and wide. Only downside is the neck is itchy so I had to wash it a few times, I think it's the stitching. Fine now though.
customer_reviews.author: B Thiesen

customer_reviews.title: Met all my expectations, I love this nursing cover.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about how much coverage this would provide since I am bigger than the model in the photo, but it covers great, and is high quality material. I am really happy with my purchase. I give it 5 stars because it gives me all the things I was looking for in a nursing cover. I wanted something that had ample coverage, a stiff neckband so I can see my baby, and it's sturdy material so it doesn't feel like it's gonna come apart after the first wash. As a bonus, the pattern is cute and the straps are adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Alma P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pretty modest mama and this thing was a game changer for me! I had so much anxiety going out in public and feeding my little guy because I'd cover myself with a blanket or burp rag and he would always get too hot or tear it off. I would just hope that he wouldn't get hungry until I got home. This stays in place, is easy to use and works super well!
customer_reviews.author: nicki

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The material was thinner than I’d expected but it does the job well especially when you’re somewhere that you really don’t want to show off what you’re doing. I have used this in restaurants and park benches. It helps keep me calm for nursing.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Never thought I’d be the mom to cover up but it’s easy, light, and has a wire to hold open so you can actually see you baby while feeding. It’s nice to have in some public places .
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Mintz

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is fine, in fact it's identical to the$6 cover I also bought! Exact same pattern and everything! Wish I would've known that the $6 cover was identical to this one! Very bummed with the cost
customer_reviews.author: Kristi5

customer_reviews.title: Not premium
customer_reviews.text: Fabric quality is thin and not premium. The sewing is poor with loose threads (see photo).
customer_reviews.author: happygal

customer_reviews.title: This nursing cover gives great coverage. I have tried another type of cover
customer_reviews.text: This nursing cover gives great coverage. I have tried another type of cover, but never used it since it was very hot, and it did not allow me to see what I was doing, or for baby to see me. This cover had a built in wire arm that holds the fabric away from your chest so you and baby can see each other, and allows for ventilation. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Best of the 4 I tried
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can see my baby and get her to latch with this. It looks less like a shower curtain than other similar ones, and has the right amount of coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Finally a cover that works for us
customer_reviews.text: Third times a charm. Have tried two other covers (one made by a friend via pattern, one another hand me down). Both didn't cover me well enough and the top didn't stay open good enough to be able to easily glance down at baby. They were also a thicker hotter material. The bebe au lait is nice and light weight and the opening at the top works good. Baby girl is now 9 months old and sometimes yanks and kicks at the cover but it still stays where it needs to be (within reason of course).
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Much better than stretchy covers
customer_reviews.text: I initially used a spandex car seat/nursing cover- however was very claustrophobic for my baby to nurse comfortably and I couldn’t see him to latch- this is much easier and provides good coverage and visibility of baby!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G.

customer_reviews.title: These nursing covers are great. I have two of the covers
customer_reviews.text: These nursing covers are great. I have two of the covers, black and the pattern, which are wonderful for coverage when out in public or when I'd like some extra privacy while nursing our baby. The wrap around neck is great because the inside band is designed to circle around your neck to allow you to view your baby while nursing. It provides plenty of coverage all around my chest. Great design, great product.
customer_reviews.author: DixieBud

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. So much cheaper on here too. I was worried it wouldn't be the same but it is. My sister in law had one and I fell in love . The thing is big for me and covers me well. I'm 140 and 5"4. It gives me more than enough and my boy is a big Boy. I like the plastic part of the top because it keeps it open and I can see him the whole time. It's open enough for me to see without having to worry more people could see through it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on a different nursing cover, this one is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I tried a different nursing cover and it was terrible. I should have bought this one to begin with. It provides good coverage, but doesn't bother my baby. My favorite feature is the structured top, which allows me to see my baby while I nurse.
customer_reviews.author: R White

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: i had this nursing cover when my son was born and i loved it! tried other types and brands and nothing came close. just had our second child and accidentally left it at the hospital when we were discharged. i got on amazing immediately and ordered another! just got it in the mail and we’re very pleased 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My little one didn’t like to stay latched and it made it very difficult to nurse with other covers. I love that I could see what I was doing to help relatch him.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: This is a MUST for breastfeeding moms
customer_reviews.text: Really, how do people use a cover that doesn’t stay open arpundvthe neck? I have no idea. This allows you to look down, see baby latch, and stays open so you can check in on the little one as they nurse. It’s the only way to go. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: A must!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one in 8 years. They are very durable, I still have the first one I bought but wanted a change in color. I find I like this better than others that can also cover your car seat because if I get hot I can just lift a flap and fan me and baby, something you can’t do when you are wearing one that covers your back.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My favorite nursing/pump cover. Love the pattern and towel addition
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Rae

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I have made in a long time
customer_reviews.text: This nursing cover is awesome! Where were these when my oldest child was born? I just bought this to use with my third baby and I love it. It is so easy to use. The little plastic piece at the top makes it easy for me to see where baby is, but still give good privacy (as long as no one is above you!) And I love the color and pattern. It is so pretty. Gone are the days with my first two kids when I fought and struggled with flimsy receiving blankets as nursing covers and couldn't see baby while nursing!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Schulte

customer_reviews.title: I love the terry cloth at the bottom to wipe up ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the terry cloth at the bottom to wipe up and milk dribbles and the fact that its also a pocket is great for keeping her Binky in for afterwards. The size is big, which makes me feel really confident breastfeeding in public, even on a windy day because I can just sit on part of the cover and feel totally secure. The hoop at the top is wonderful because I can she her as she is trying to latch and keep eye contact as she feeds. Total bonding.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Turnbull

customer_reviews.title: Favorite cover up!
customer_reviews.text: Love my cover up, it makes it easier to breastfeed in public thanks to the neckline that extends away from your chest making it easy for you to see baby/ less hot for you and baby! I think I will buy another one in a different color soon too!
customer_reviews.author: christina Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a second one to keep in the diaper bag. Excellent coverage and cute design.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Totally recommend it the fabric is light and probably less hot than another cover ups i had purchased; my baby is actually ok eating under it!so far the only cover up shes ok with eating under! I love that the corners offer a towel edge it comes in handy if u need to use it while breastfeeding your little one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan, you’re really wearing an apron here. The designs are also not as pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: pierson g.

customer_reviews.title: Not for full chested women
customer_reviews.text: Not for full figure chest. I was not able to find the proper setting so that I could see my LO in the peephole
customer_reviews.author: Sasscnee

customer_reviews.title: A great concept
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great cover up but I still find it hard to use in the beginning weeks of nursing because although you can see the baby, it’s still hard for me to visualize everything I need to see, but that could just be me.
customer_reviews.author: Love2shop

customer_reviews.title: Well made and nice print
customer_reviews.text: When I was younger, we just threw a blanket over our shoulder, but I can see the convenience of using an apron like this i.e., less worry at being exposed in public. Did not keep the item, though, I sewed a larger version for my daughter who might need to nurse two babies at once (twins). The print and color (ordered gray) were nice and I liked the detail of the wider neck strap. Thought that looked comfortable. I will have to revise my pattern to include this next time.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Giver

customer_reviews.title: My favorite nursing apron
customer_reviews.text: This is the only nursing apron/scarf my daughter will nurse under.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie M.

customer_reviews.title: works like you dream it would
customer_reviews.text: get two: one for home and one for the baby bag. We got a lot of things for a our first kiddo. Wife says this was the best thing she purchased
customer_reviews.author: bigcountry7889

customer_reviews.title: So nice! Nice heavy natural fabric so it breathes but ...
customer_reviews.text: So nice! Nice heavy natural fabric so it breathes but doesn't blow around. The neck ring is very help. Love the pattern. Update: used this 1 year for baby 1, and am using it again for baby 2. I use it primarily at home when company is around. It still looks brand new and works as like new
customer_reviews.author: AFB

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This cover has made it very easy to nurse out of the house. The material is light enough to nurse in the summer and has a plastic piece up by the neck so you can see the baby and baby has some airflow. I love the adjustable neck strap and hidden burp cloths on the interior corners. Very easy to throw on and has great coverage!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! So easy to wear and breastfeed in public with. I feel very secure and covered up while breastfeeding
customer_reviews.author: Desiree G.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't wash very well and I don't like how my back is exposed
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. It doesn't wash very well and I don't like how my back is exposed. The best thing about it is the stiff collar so I can have a constant view of my baby. I ended up purchasing a cover that goes all the way around me and is made of a softer fabric
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Cute covering. I knocked a star because it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute covering. I knocked a star because it is sometimes hard to control the top, which is supposed to give you access to view your little one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover!!!! It's my second cover and it kicked the first ones butt. Baby is comfortable, I can see her, and she has plenty of room. The cloth corners are so helpful too! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Tinkrbell23

customer_reviews.title: perfect nursing cover
customer_reviews.text: I was getting frustrated, having to always leave the room to nurseity, while at family gatherings. I tried another nursing cover and my baby freaked... she would pull on it and scream. The Bebe Au Lait nursing cover works perfect. The fabric is great quality. It is nice and lightweight, as well as light in color, so it's not dark underneath for my baby. There is a rounded neckline that makes it easy to view her while she's eating. She can easily look back at me. This nursing cover has been a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: happymom

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This nursing cover is soo worth it- it's much much higher quality then those 'udder covers'. Three friends of mine have these and use them all the time and the boning has never come out like it does after a couple weeks with the udder cover brand ones. Also the fabric is so much sturdier and softer, it's bigger, and those burp cloths in the corners are super handy for drooly babies. I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is very well made
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is very well made. Only issue is that the fabric is heavier than other brands. It may get too hot for the baby if you live in warmer climates. I used mine all the time in the winter and spring. Now I'm much better at feeding without a cover though so I don't use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Ridged neckline so you can see baby
customer_reviews.text: The ridged neckline is awesome—I can actually see my baby. She can pop off if distracted, so this provides a calming environment.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew & Kaylyn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great nursing cover! It provides plenty of coverage, has some structure at the neck that stays open so you can see what's going on under there, has an adjustable next strap, and little terrycloth patches in the corners on the underside for wiping up milk which also double as pockets so you can keep your nursing pads or lanolin in there.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: great shape and functionality, bad fabric - HOT!
customer_reviews.text: The fabric doesn't breath. At all. It is heavyweight. This results in a very hot, flustered feeling while nursing. I hate this thing because of this. The shape is great, the washcloths on the corners are great, just some breathable fabric for goodness sake please!!
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Not so great if it is hot outside or where you are ...
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping the material was more breathable. Not so great if it is hot outside or where you are nursing at. Overall ok.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love this mursing cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this mursing cover. I really like that i can see my baby and she can see me. Provides great coverage. I also like. The pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Returned for cheaper one with more cover.
customer_reviews.text: A little shorter than I expected, so ended up returning. But the quality was great and the fabric was stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Allison H

customer_reviews.title: Love the bone
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a more expensive cover without the bone (the plastic part that makes the top part stick out). This cover has a bone at the top and allows me to see my baby latch and nurse. I had a difficult time with my baby latching, so it was EXTREMELY important for me to have a cover that allowed me to see my baby the entire time. I love this pattern as well. I get lots of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute. I’ve tried it on but haven’t been able to use it with baby quite yet. It’s laid a little funny on me but I think it’ll still work.
customer_reviews.author: Kjeanm84

customer_reviews.title: Functional and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this nursing cover! I appreciate the ability to see my baby while discreetly nursing. It is also lightweight. Only downside is that as the baby gets older they can more easily grab and move the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fair.
customer_reviews.text: The package was old and broken, not as good as described.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: I love this cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover. It's got a wire like top so you ca still see baby and be covered. It's a really cute pattern and has a terry cloth bottom for spills or spit ups. The only negative is that it's a thin sheet but not necessarily see through
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and easy to use. I also love that the "collar" area has a structured portion so that the cover doesnt lie flat on your chest. it allows for better ventilation for the baby as well as gives you a "view" of baby while nursing. I guess my only wish is that is came with a little carrying bag or something. That is just me really searching for a way to make this more perfect though. :)
customer_reviews.author: Holden & Greys Mama

customer_reviews.title: Good and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very good nursing cover. I can check my baby's latch with the wired opening on the top. I highly recommend this nursing cover. It is also nice to have a towel cloth pocket to wipe baby's mouth. However, while this nursing cover is very thin, it is too hot for my baby to use in the summer of Tokyo (hot and humid) without air con in the room.
customer_reviews.author: HananaBanana

customer_reviews.title: Must have for mammas
customer_reviews.text: This is such a big help to new moms who need to see their baby while feeding. Very helpful early on when you are learning how to get baby to latch. It provides good full coverage and the looped opening is also nice for the baby to get some air while feeding- especially if outdoors in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: cakeisbetter

customer_reviews.title: Cute pattern
customer_reviews.text: I like the coverage and cute pattern. I feel like I have to readjust the neck every time, but this might just be me. Anyway, its nice since I had no idea what type of cover to buy. My LO likes to look at it right now cause of the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Breast feeding didn't work out for me ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Breast feeding didn't work out for me and my little one so i only used it a few times but I loved the fact that I could see my little one through the scoop neck!! All my girl friends have this one and swear by this cover!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharday Timm

customer_reviews.title: Great cover!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is larger and covers the sides which was always a problem with the other covers I've had. The bendable hoop at the top allows you to see baby while still keeping everything covered and the two pockets on the inside are great for storing breast pads!! I finally was able to nurse comfortably in public with my 2nd baby.
customer_reviews.author: KetoBeauties

customer_reviews.title: Good for backyard, too!
customer_reviews.text: We moved to a new house right before baby was born and now have a backyard which shares a fence with neighbors. It's summer and my preschooler likes to play outside, so it's nice to have this cover, since it is large enough to cover me and baby. I pop baby's head up, through the viewing neck stap, so she can look around when I burp her!
customer_reviews.author: JCies

customer_reviews.title: but was not at all satisfied. My husband actually purchased this for me after ...
customer_reviews.text: I had originally bought a different nursing cover from an online company, but was not at all satisfied. My husband actually purchased this for me after getting sick of hearing me complain about my current nursing cover! This cover is thick, but not heavy. It Covers me perfectly without having too much excess material. The corners with burp cloth material are perfect for those moments you can't grab your burp cloth fast enough! The plastic piece around the neck allows room for you to see your baby without allowing others to see down. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Tameling

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes to see moms face... works great
customer_reviews.text: This nursing cover had worked great for my little one and me. The boning allows her to still see me which is apparently very important. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley HH King

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this “apron” style to other cover styles. It’s lightweight, cute, easy to use and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Cute and works great. It can get hot, but I wouldn’t think there would be a way not to!
customer_reviews.author: Gi Lawlor

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the print of this nursing cover. I also love the terry cloth pocket/burp cloth in the corners because it weighs down the cover just enough. I do wish it was a little wider, but overall I'm very happy with it. It's also held up well in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: IdahoGal6

customer_reviews.title: Best Coverup Out There!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best coverup out there because it has the plastic piece at the top to keep a opening while you nurse so you can see your baby and easily adjust, while ensuring the baby isn’t being smothered by the coverup! I loved it so much I ordered another!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Banegas

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!!! WORTH EVERY PENNY!!
customer_reviews.text: A must have for a breastfeeding mom. You can see your baby while feeding and the pockets on the inside of the bottom works as a weight so even in the wind it doesnt fly off. Also it works as carseat cover so 2 in 1. The only downside is that in the summer the air doesnt get through so the baby gets hot.
customer_reviews.author: Melsmay

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This nursing cover is very well made. I especially like the corners because of the terry cloth pockets sewn on. Not only do they come in handy for wiping mouths, chins, etc. I think it weighs it down a bit and helps with keeping everything covered. There is also a fair amount of fabric which can sometimes be a bad thing while trying to keep it out of my little one's face and hold him at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi’s Music

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Helps me nurse discreetly
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Helps me nurse discreetly. My baby has started getting grabby, so not sure if she will let me continue using it for much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cheatham

customer_reviews.title: Surprisedly good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality cover. Not see-thru. It is soft and covers very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the nursing cover! The design is very nice and I love the inside cloth at the edges which can be used as a burp cloth or to insert my baby's pacifier. My daughter loves the design too. Sometimes she stops feeding to play with the nursing cover which I think is cute. She didn't do this with my other nursing cover which was just solid black inside.
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This cover up is not only beautiful but also very useful
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.K

customer_reviews.title: Nursing Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Bebe au Lait cover I've purchased because I can't live without it (I'm nursing baby no. 3). Not only does it come in cute colors but the coverage is excellent. I never have to worry about flashing and it's easy to help your baby latch on with the peekaboo top. Also, as baby gets older they like to kick off or pull off other covers, but not so with this one! Life saving product!
customer_reviews.author: D. Boholst

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love mine so much that I bought one for my cousin. It’s lightweight and comfortable. I love that the top brim allows for me to see my baby while feeding her.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W

customer_reviews.title: Breastfeeding must have
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, rolls up nicely in the diaper bag. Easy to see baby and the terry cloth corners are super handy!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Best Nursing Cover I've scene for such a low price!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this cover as a shower gift and am in love with it! I've always used the cheaper thinner ones before b/c I couldn't fathom spending $50 or more for the nicer ones like Tommee Tippie etc. I really liked the TT ones because they have the corner for wiping babies mouth, but guess what so does this one! I originally registered for this at BRU where it was around $40. Being an Amazon Junkie I looked here and found it for $25!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my Sister
customer_reviews.text: She LOVES this. She likes it b/c of the 'framed' neckline that allows her to see the baby while she is nursing. My sister is quite buxom (pre baby) and also very modest - this provided great coverage. Gorgeous pattern, cleans beautifully and has served her well so far. Great value - great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. MLB

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My favorite nursing cover. My only regret is I didnt buy it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: I love this nursing cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this nursing cover. I love how you can see the baby. It's not the best in Florida summer because of heat but it works superbly otherwise. I can see the baby and he can see me, and have privacy.
customer_reviews.author: blackhawk8008

customer_reviews.title: I love being able to see my baby and for him ...
customer_reviews.text: These covers are so much nicer than the infinity scarves! I love being able to see my baby and for him to see me!
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Must have for new moms
customer_reviews.text: A must have for breastfeeding moms. Covers in entirety, cute and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Jamara

customer_reviews.title: Neckline doesn’t always work.
customer_reviews.text: The idea of the peek-able neckline is great but it doesn’t always work like it should. Other than that it’s just your regular nursing cover.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Seriously best nursing cover EVER!! It's very lightweight and i have the confidence to nurse anywhere with this cover. The pattern is beautiful too!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan W

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: High quality. It costs more than other covers, but it’s well made. I love that you can look in easily due to the rigid collar.
customer_reviews.author: L Le

customer_reviews.title: Definitely is great to have
customer_reviews.text: Definitely is great to have. If it's positioned correctly, you can see your little one perfectly and watch them as you nurse. Sometimes, it's hard to position the opening to view the baby, but otherwise is great!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha O

customer_reviews.title: Very bulky
customer_reviews.text: This looks great but it's very bulky to put on. Also it gets really hot underneath the cover and the top is too wide and cumbersome so it keeps sliding away. You practically need 3 hands to make it work properly as a nursing cover.
customer_reviews.author: Sits

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional - buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful solution to public breastfeeding need for privacy. Simple, lightweight fabric, good coverage (I am small) and the flexible (plastic?) boned neck area gives the baby breathing room and lets me peek down to check on her during feedings without having to uncover myself. Beautiful design (I have the silver/grey with white), and I've gotten so many compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: amazonian

product_meta.title: Bebe au Lait Premium Cotton Nursing Cover, Lightweight and Breathable Cotton, Open Neckline, One Size Fits All - Chateau Silver
product_meta.description:
Color:Chateau SilverThe Bebe au Lait Premium Cotton Nursing Cover helps maintain privacy and comfort while nursing on the go. This breastfeeding cover has a patented Rig flex open neckline that holds the cover away from mom and baby, which allows them to maintain eye contact and continue the important bond during breastfeeding. The neckline features a patented Interlocking Cap System that prevents sharp boning material from breaking through the ends, making it more durable and protective than the competition. The open neckline also ensures proper air flow and allows mom to see that baby is properly latched, encouraging breastfeeding success. The neck strap is secure and adjustable to hold the cover in place, so you can breastfeed with confidence no matter where you are. This one-size-fits-all nursing cover is made with 100-Percent cotton and has two internal terry cloth pockets for cleanups and storage. Chateau Silver is our modern take on a Victorian classic with romantic silver and white motifs. The Bebe au Lait Premium Cotton Nursing Cover is machine washable, so it's always clean and ready to go when you need it. Bebe au Lait's award-winning products have been a favorite of celebrities and parents since 2004. Bebe au Lait is committed to creating products that families love, whether it’s for bath time, mealtime, or on the go. All Bebe au Lait products are made of the highest quality materials and tested to meet international safety standards. Designed by parents for parents, Bebe au Lait is the practical and luxurious choice that parents reach for first.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Nursing Cover, Chateau Silver. Unique rigid neckline allows for ventilation, as well as direct eye contact with the baby. Terrycloth pocket detail for quick cleanup or storage of breast pads or pacifiers. 100% cotton machine washable. Generous sizing keeps mommy completely covered during breastfeeding. Multi-use: can be used as a nursing cover, a blanket, or even a sunshade to protect baby's fragile skin from harmful UV rays.
feature_bullets: Form and Function - Patented Rig flex open neckline holds cover away from mom and baby, ensuring proper air flow and allowing them to maintain eye contact for crucial bonding
Parents On-The-Go - Neck strap holds the nursing cover in place so you can breastfeed in public with confidence
The Right Size - One Size Fits All nursing cover measures approximately 36-inches wide by 30-inches long and has two internal terry cloth pockets for cleanups and storage
Machine Washable - Breathable, premium 100% cotton is soft, gentle, and machine washable

By Parents, For Parents - Bebe au Lait is committed to creating products that families love, whether it's for bath time, mealtime, or on the go. All Bebe au Lait products are made of the highest quality materials and tested to meet international safety standards.
